txt.en: 'I'd bet the Blackwolds will move against us soon. Mark my words...when they do, we'll be ready.'
'So Calder Cob is a brigand spy?  Figures.  Bloody fool cares about his stomach, and little else.'
'Wish they'd let me into the prison.  I'd give that traitor Cob what-for...'
'Move along, friend, and don't stir any trouble.'
'Watch yourself, stranger. We don't take kindly to roustabouts.'
'Wish I knew what Peg's been feeding us. I think it's meat, but I ain't seen no cows butchered in weeks.'
